data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Almeida, Thaís Melo De, Shelley, Rowland M., Rafael, José Albertino (2018): Xanthotropis, a new genus in the Neotropical millipede subfamily Aphelidesminae (Diplopoda, Polydesmida, Aphelidesmidae). Zootaxa 4471 (2): 351-360, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4471.2.7
